edu.first.module.sensors

Class GyroscopeModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.first.module.Module.StartardModule
      • edu.first.module.sensors.GyroscopeModule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Input, PositionalSensor, Module, Gyroscope

    public class GyroscopeModule
extends Module.StartardModule
implements Gyroscope
    Module implementation of the KoP gyroscope. Composes and wraps Gyro, giving it module properties to fit with the standard in atalibj.
    Since:
    May 22 13

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface edu.first.module.Module

        Module.StartardModule

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GyroscopeModule(AnalogChannel channel)
      Constructs the module with the channel of the gyroscope.
      GyroscopeModule(Gyro gyro)
      Constructs the module with the gyro object to underneath this class to call methods from.
      GyroscopeModule(int channel, int slot)
      Constructs the module with the port on the analog sidecar and which slot the sidecar is in.

        public GyroscopeModule(int channel,
               int slot)
        Constructs the module with the port on the analog sidecar and which slot the sidecar is in.
        Parameters:
        channel - port on sidecar
        slot - slow in cRIO (1 = default)

      • disableModule

        public void disableModule()
        Description copied from class: Module.StartardModule
        Performs the necessary actions to ensure the module cannot be used. The module's functions should not work after this method is called, provided this method did not throw an error.
        Specified by:
        disableModule in class Module.StartardModule

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Resets the cumulative angle to zero.
        Specified by:

      • setSensitivity

        public void setSensitivity(double voltsPerDegreePerSecond)
        Sets the sensitivity of the gyroscope for calculating the angle in degrees. Units are volts / degrees / second.
        Specified by:
        setSensitivity in interface Gyroscope
        Parameters:
        voltsPerDegreePerSecond - sensitivity to set the gyro to
